entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
